title: The Braxtons
overview: In a new, not-to-be-missed reality series, The Braxtons, Toni, Towanda, Trina, Tamar and Ms. Evelyn will reunite to share new love, success, heartbreak, ongoing family dynamics and so much more.It's been more than three years since the Braxton family graced the screen with their hit series Braxton Family Values which ran for seven seasons and still remains one of TV's most beloved family docuseries. Now, the Braxton family is back with a new series, picking up where they left off: sharing their rollercoaster journey as a family from the last few years to the family's present triumphs. The series will feature never before seen private moments, from quarantine to the devastating loss of their sister Traci and taking viewers into their lives as the build this new chapter without her.
